labs.title: NMAP Practical Labs
labs.description: NMAP is a network scanner that can be used to scan networks and identify open ports, services, and other information.

labs.title: Security Engineering Fundamentals
labs.description: Understanding the core principles of security engineering and how to apply them to real-world scenarios.

labs.title: Zero-Trust Architecture
labs.description: Zero-Trust Architecture is a security model that assumes that all users, devices, and applications are potentially hostile and must be verified and authenticated.
